name: Konstrukt™ Tileworks™ K-302 All-Purpose Tile Adhesive
subtitle: K-302 All-Purpose Tile Adhesive

info.title: DESCRIPTION
info.body: Konstrukt™ Tileworks™ K-302 All-Purpose Tile Adhesive is a cement-based adhesive formulated for installing and fixing ceramic tiles on horizontal and vertical concrete surfaces for both thin-bed and thick-bed applications.

info.title: MATERIAL PREPARATION
info.body: Mix 25-kg bag of K-302 All-Purpose Tile Adhesive with 6-Liters of clean water. Stir using a mixing device until the desirable consistency is achieved. Let stand for 2 minutes prior to use. Do not add cement or any other materials into the mixture.

info.title: SURFACE PREPARATION
info.body: Surface should be clean and dry, free from dust, dirt, and other foreign matter. It is important to dampen the substrate prior to the application of the tile adhesive.

info.title: APPLICATION SCHEDULE
info.body:
Using a notched trowel, spread the adhesive one square meter at a time. Apply to desired thickness to level the uneven surface. Place and align tiles by moving it back and forth. Adjust height accordingly by gently tapping the tiles using the handle of the trowel or a rubber mallet. Fix tiles immediately within 15 minutes open time. 
Note: Foot traffic may be allowed after 24 hours; for heavy-duty use, wait for 7 days.
